name: Imitinerals
description:
My first game ever! Like, ever! Made for MiniJam 52. Not sure why I chose to make a puzzle-like game... I know it plays more like a project demo, but I'm still proud of what I learned :) Hope you enjoy it even the slightest bit!

Please give me as much feedback as possible, I've been using Unity for less than a month but I wanna get way better at it!
